#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        long long int m,n;

        int count=0;

        scanf("%lld %lld",&m,&n);

        if(n<=m)
            printf("%d\n",m-n);

        else
        {
            while(m!=n)
            {
                if(n%2==1)
                {
                    n++;
                    count++;
                }

                n/=2;

                count++;

                if(n<m)
                {
                    count+=(m-n);
                    break;
                }
            }

            printf("%d\n",count);
        }
    }

    return(0);
}
